summary.span: 在 ASP.NET 网页中显示菜单。

span.span: Displays a menu in an ASP.NET Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [菜单项Menu Items](#menu_items) - [静态数据Static Data](#static_data) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于在 ASP.NET 网页中显示菜单, 并且通常与用于导航网站的控件结合使用。 The control is used to display a menu in an ASP.NET Web page and is often used in combination with a control for navigating a Web site. 控件支持以下功能:The control supports the following features: - 允许控件的菜单项绑定到层次的数据源的数据绑定。Data binding that allows the control's menu items to be bound to hierarchal data sources. - 通过与控件集成的站点导航。Site navigation through integration with the control. - 以编程方式访问对象模型以动态创建菜单、填充菜单项、设置属性等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically create menus, populate menu items, set properties, and so on. - 通过主题、用户定义的图像、样式和用户定义的模板自定义外观。Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, styles, and user-defined templates. 当用户单击菜单项时, 控件可以导航到链接的网页, 或只是回发到服务器。When the user clicks a menu item, the control can either navigate to a linked Web page or simply post back to the server. 如果设置了菜单项的属性 , 则控件将导航到链接页; 否则, 它会将该页回发到服务器以进行处理。If the property of a menu item is set, the control navigates to the linked page; otherwise, it posts the page back to the server for processing. 默认情况下, 链接页显示在与控件相同的窗口或框架中。By default, a linked page is displayed in the same window or frame as the control. 若要在不同的窗口或框架中显示链接的内容, 请使用控件的属性。To display the linked content in a different window or frame, use the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性会影响控件中的每个菜单项。The property affects every menu item in the control. 若要为单个菜单项指定窗口或框架, 请直接设置该对象的属性。To specify a window or frame for an individual menu item, set the property of the object directly. 控件将显示两种类型的菜单: 静态菜单和动态菜单。The control displays two types of menus: a static menu and a dynamic menu. 静态菜单始终显示在控件中。The static menu is always displayed in a control. 默认情况下, 根级别 (级别 0) 的菜单项显示在静态菜单中。By default, the menu items at the root level (level 0) are displayed in the static menu. 通过设置属性, 可以在静态菜单中显示其他菜单级别 (静态子菜单)。You can display additional menu levels (static submenus) within the static menu by setting the property. 具有高于属性指定的值的菜单项 (如果有) 将显示在动态菜单中。Menu items (if any) with a higher level than the value specified by the property are displayed in a dynamic menu. 仅当用户将鼠标指针置于包含动态子菜单的父菜单项上时, 才会显示动态菜单。A dynamic menu appears only when the user positions the mouse pointer over the parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 动态菜单在一定的持续时间后自动消失。Dynamic menus automatically disappear after a certain duration. 使用属性指定持续时间。Use the property to specify the duration. > [!NOTE] > 当用户在菜单外部单击时, 动态菜单也会消失。A dynamic menu also disappears when the user clicks outside of the menu. 还可以通过设置属性来限制动态菜单中显示的级别数。You can also limit the number of levels displayed in a dynamic menu by setting the property. 超过指定值的菜单级别将被丢弃。Menu levels higher than the specified value are discarded. > [!NOTE] > 控件不设计为在控件内使用。 The control is not designed to be used inside an control. 只能将控件添加到控件之外的页面。You can add the control only to a page outside an control. 控件用于更新页面的选定区域, 而不是使用回发来更新整个页面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[部分页呈现概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 菜单项Menu Items 控件由对象表示的菜单项树组成。 A control is made up of a tree of menu items represented by objects. 顶层 (级别 0) 的菜单项称为根菜单项。Menu items at the top level (level 0) are called root menu items. 具有父菜单项的菜单项称为子菜单项。A menu item that has a parent menu item is called a child menu item. 所有根菜单项都存储在集合中。All root menu items are stored in the collection. 子菜单项存储在父菜单项的集合中。Child menu items are stored in a parent menu item's collection. 每个菜单项都具有和属性。Each menu item has a and a property. 属性的值显示在控件中, 而属性用于存储有关菜单项的任何其他数据, 如传递到与菜单项关联的回发事件的数据。The value of the property is displayed in the control, while the property is used to store any additional data about the menu item, such as data passed to the postback event associated with the menu item. 单击菜单项时, 它可以导航到由属性指示的另一个网页。When clicked, a menu item can navigate to another Web page indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有为菜单项设置该属性, 则在单击菜单项时, 控件将只向服务器提交该页进行处理。If the property is not set for a menu item, the control simply submits the page to the server for processing when the menu item is clicked. 还可以通过设置属性, 在菜单项中选择性地显示图像。You can also optionally display an image in a menu item by setting the property. 有关菜单项的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on menu items, see . ## 静态数据Static Data 控件的最简单数据模型为静态菜单项。The simplest data model of the control is static menu items. 若要使用声明性语法显示静态菜单项, 请首先在`` 控件的开始和结束标记之间嵌套开始和结束标记。To display static menu items using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来, 通过在开始和结束`` ``标记之间嵌套元素来创建菜单结构。Next, create the menu structure by nesting `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags. 每``个元素都表示控件中的一个菜单项, 并映射到一个对象。Each `` element represents a menu item in the control and maps to a object. 您可以通过设置``每个菜单项的元素的属性来设置这些属性。You can set the properties of each menu item by setting the attributes of its `` element. 若要创建子菜单项, ``请在父菜单项的``开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套其他元素。To create submenu items, nest additional `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags of the parent menu item. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件可以使用任何分层数据源控件, 如控件或控件。 The control can use any hierarchal data source control, such as an control or a control. 若要绑定到层次的数据源控件, 请将控件的属性设置为数据源控件的值。To bind to a hierarchal data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 这是绑定到数据的首选方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. 绑定到数据源时, 如果每个数据项都包含多个属性 (如具有多个属性的 XML 元素), 则菜单项默认显示由`ToString`数据项的方法返回的值。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString` method of the data item by default. 对于 XML 元素, 菜单项显示元素名称, 该名称显示菜单树的基础结构, 但在其他情况下并不十分有用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu tree but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以通过使用集合指定菜单项绑定, 将菜单项绑定到特定数据项属性。You can bind a menu item to a specific data item property by using the collection to specify menu item bindings. 集合包含的对象定义数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to. 您可以指定要在节点中显示的绑定条件和数据项属性。You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node. 有关菜单项绑定的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on menu item bindings, see . 如果 将或属性设置为空字符串 (""), 则不能在控件中创建空节点。 You cannot create empty nodes in a control by setting the or properties to the empty string (""). 将这些属性设置为空字符串与不设置属性的效果相同。Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties. 在这种情况下 , 控件使用属性创建默认绑定。In that case, the control creates a default binding using the property. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information, see [Binding to Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 可以通过多种方式自定义控件的外观。There are many ways to customize the appearance of the control. 首先, 可以通过 设置属性来指定是水平还是垂直呈现控件。First, you can specify whether the control is rendered horizontally or vertically by setting the property. 还可以为每个菜单项类型指定不同的样式 (如字体大小和颜色)。You can also specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the menu item types. 如果使用级联样式表 (CSS) 来自定义控件的外观, 则可以使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件, 但不能同时使用两者。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 同时使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能导致意外的结果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. 有关将样式表用于控件的详细信息, 请参阅[Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42)。For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42). 下表列出了可用的菜单项样式。The following table lists the available menu item styles. |菜单项样式属性Menu item style property|说明Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项上时, 动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||动态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||当前选定动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项上时该菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||静态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu.| ||当前选定的静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 您可以使用以下样式集合来指定基于菜单项级别应用于菜单项的样式, 而不是设置各个样式属性。Instead of setting the individual style properties, you can specify styles that are applied to menu items based on their level by using the following style collections. |级别样式集合Level style collections|说明Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| ||对象的集合, 这些对象根据级别控制菜单项的样式。A collection of objects that control the style of the menu items on a level basis.| ||对象的集合, 这些对象根据级别控制选定菜单项的样式。A collection of objects that control the style of selected menu items on a level basis.| ||对象的集合, 这些对象根据级别控制子菜单项的样式。A collection of objects that control the style of the submenu items on a level basis.| 集合中的第一种样式对应于菜单树中第一个深度级别的菜单项样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the first depth level in the menu tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于菜单树中第二个深度级别的菜单项的样式, 依此类推。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the second depth level in the menu tree, and so on. 这通常用于生成目录样式的导航菜单, 其中特定深度的菜单项应具有相同外观, 无论它们是否具有子菜单。This is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用上表中列出的任何级别样式集合来定义控件的样式, 则这些样式设置将覆盖各个菜单项的样式属性。If you use any of the level style collections listed in the previous table to define the style for the control, these style settings override the individual menu item style properties. 更改控件外观的另一种方法是自定义控件中显示的图像。Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images displayed in the control. 您可以通过设置下表中显示的属性, 为控件的不同部分指定您自己的自定义映像。You can specify your own custom image for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table. |Image 属性Image property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||显示在动态菜单项底部的可选图像, 用于将其与其他菜单项隔开。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||显示在动态菜单项中的可选图像, 用于指示该图像具有子菜单。An optional image displayed in a dynamic menu item to indicate that it has a submenu.| ||显示在动态菜单项顶部的可选图像, 用于将其与其他菜单项隔开。An optional image displayed at the top of a dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||显示在菜单项底部的图像, 用于指示用户可以向下滚动查看更多菜单项。The image displayed at the bottom of a menu item to indicate that the user can scroll down to view additional menu items.| ||显示在菜单项顶部的图像, 用于指示用户可以向上滚动查看更多菜单项。The image displayed at the top of a menu item to indicate that the user can scroll up to view additional menu items.| ||显示在静态菜单项底部的可选图像, 用于将其与其他菜单项隔开。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a static menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||显示在静态菜单项中的可选图像, 用于指示该图像具有子菜单。An optional image displayed in a static menu item to indicate that it has a submenu.| ||在静态菜单项顶部显示的可选图像, 用于将其与其他菜单项隔开。An optional image displayed at the top of a static menu item to separate it from other menu items.| 若要完全控制用户界面 (UI), 可以使用以下模板属性为控件定义自己的自定义模板。For complete control of the user interface (UI), you can define your own custom templates for the control using the following template properties. |模板属性Template property|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||包含动态菜单项的呈现自定义内容的模板。The template that contains the custom content to render for a dynamic menu item.| ||包含要为静态菜单项呈现的自定义内容的模板。The template that contains the custom content to render for a static menu item.| 您可以分别通过设置和属性来控制动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的垂直和水平位置。You can control the vertical and horizontal position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item by setting the and properties, respectively. 若要控制静态菜单中静态子菜单项的缩进, 请使用属性。To control the indentation of the static submenu items within a static menu, use the property. ## 事件Events 控件提供了几个可对其进行编程的事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这使您可以在每次发生事件时运行自定义例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了支持的事件。The following table lists the supported events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击菜单项时发生。Occurs when a menu item is clicked. 此事件通常用于使控件与页面上的另一个控件同步。This event is commonly used to synchronize a control with another control on the page.| ||在菜单项绑定到数据时发生。Occurs when a menu item is bound to data. 此事件通常用于在菜单项呈现在控件中之前修改菜单项。This event is commonly used to modify a menu item before it is rendered in a control.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目:[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192868)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192868). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法创建包含静态菜单项的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control with static menu items using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/CS/menudeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/VB/menudeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将控件绑定到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the control to a control. 要使此示例正常工作, 您必须将下面的示例站点地图数据复制到名为 web.sitemap 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/CS/menudatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/VB/menudatabindvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你以编程方式访问控件的类的实例。 The property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the class for the control. 您可以向集合添加控件、从集合中移除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.

ASP.NET 基础结构调用此方法, 通知任何使用基于撰写的实现的控件, 其中包括从和派生的控件。This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from and . 创建它们所包含的任何子控件, 以便为回发或呈现做准备。to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.

para.span: 数据绑定控件应重写 而不是。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataBindings As MenuItemBindingCollection

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象定义数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to.

value.span: ，表示数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

span.span: A that represents the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含的对象定义数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to. 绑定到数据源时, 如果每个数据项都包含多个属性 (如具有多个属性的 XML 元素), 则菜单项默认显示由`ToString()`数据项的方法返回的值。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default. 对于 XML 元素, 菜单项显示元素名称, 该名称显示树的基础结构, 但在其他情况下不起作用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以通过指定菜单项绑定, 将菜单项绑定到特定数据项属性。You can bind a menu item to a specific data item property by specifying menu item bindings. 定义数据项和菜单项之间的关系时, 必须同时指定绑定条件和要绑定到的数据项的属性。When defining the relationship between a data item and a menu item, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the property of a data item to bind to. 条件指示数据项应绑定到菜单项的时间。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item. 可以使用深度、数据成员或两者来指定条件。The criteria can be specified with a depth, a data member, or both. 深度指定绑定的菜单级别。The depth specifies the menu level that gets bound. 例如, 如果将深度指定为 0, 则将使用菜单项绑定来绑定树结构中处于级别0的所有菜单项。For example, if you specify a depth of 0, all menu items in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the menu item binding. 数据成员指定基础数据源中数据项的类型, 但可以根据数据源表示不同的信息。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 例如, XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 如果定义了多个相互冲突的对象, 则控件将按以下优先级顺序应用菜单项绑定:If multiple objects are defined that conflict with each other, the control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines both a depth and a data member. 2. 仅定义深度的对象。The object that defines only the depth. 3. 仅定义数据成员的对象。The object that defines only the data member. 4. 同时定义深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. 建立绑定条件后, 可以绑定对象的属性, 该对象可绑定到数据项的属性或字段。Once the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a object that is able to be bound to an attribute or field of a data item. 例如, 可以通过 设置对象的属性, 将菜单项的属性绑定到 XML 元素的文本特性。For example, you can bind the property of a menu item to the text attribute on an XML element by setting the property of a object. 还可以绑定到静态值。You can also bind to a static value. 如果设置了对象的属性, 则该对象应用到的所有菜单项都将具有相同的静态文本值。If you set the property of a object, all menu items to which the object is applied share the same static text value. 有关将对象属性绑定到值的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on binding the properties of a object to a value, see . 尽管可以通过编程方式填充该集合, 但通常以声明方式进行设置。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要指定菜单项绑定, 首先在`` 控件的开始和结束标记之间嵌套开始和结束标记。To specify the menu item bindings, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来, ``在要指定的每个``菜单项绑定的开始标记和结束标记之间放置元素。Next, place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each menu item binding you want to specify. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合定义控件的字段与控件中的菜单项之间的关系。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between the fields of an control and the menu items in a control. 要使此示例正常工作, 必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 .Map 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/CS/menubindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/VB/menubindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置鼠标指针不再置于菜单上后显示动态菜单的持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the duration for which a dynamic menu is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

value.span: 鼠标指针不再置于菜单上后，显示动态菜单的时间量（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The amount of time (in milliseconds) a dynamic menu is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

value.span: 默认值为 500。

span.span: The default is 500.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 当鼠标指针不再位于菜单上时, 动态菜单会在一定的持续时间后自动消失。By default, a dynamic menu automatically disappears after a certain duration when the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu. 使用属性指定持续时间。Use the property to specify the duration. > [!NOTE] > 如果用户单击菜单外部, 动态菜单将立即消失。A dynamic menu disappears immediately if the user clicks outside of the menu. 还可以通过将此属性设置为-1, 指定动态菜单永远不会自动消失。You can also specify that a dynamic menu should never automatically disappear by setting this property to -1. 在这种情况下, 仅当用户在菜单外部单击时, 动态菜单项才会消失。In this case, the dynamic menu item will disappear only when the user clicks outside the menu. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定动态菜单在用户将鼠标指针离开菜单超过两秒后消失。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that a dynamic menu should disappear after the user moves the mouse pointer away from the menu for more than two seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDisappearAfter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDisappearAfter/CS/menudisappearaftercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDisappearAfter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDisappearAfter/VB/menudisappearaftervb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The selected value is less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态菜单项包含子菜单时, 可以显示图像, 以指示用户可以通过将鼠标指针放在菜单项上来展开菜单。When a dynamic menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu by positioning the mouse pointer over the menu item. 可以通过两种方法来显示此图像:There are two ways to display this image: - 将属性设置为`true`以使用内置映像 (默认值)。 Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 设置属性以指定自定义映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. 如果设置了属性, 则该图像将覆盖内置图像。If the property is set, that image overrides the built-in image. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置 `false`属性, 并且属性设置为, 则不会显示图像。 If the property is not set and the property is set to `false`, no image is displayed. 可以通过设置属性来指定图像的替换文字。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. 当用户将鼠标指针置于图像上时, 此文本将显示为工具提示。This text is displayed as a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over the image. 此文本还为辅助技术设备提供了可用于使控件更易于访问的图像说明。This text also provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性隐藏指示动态菜单项包含子菜单的图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the image that indicates that a dynamic menu item has a submenu. 还必须将属性设置为空字符串 (""), 以使图像处于隐藏状态。 The property must also be set to an empty string ("") for the image to be hidden. summary.span: 获取或设置动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的水平移动像素数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu horizontally relative to its parent menu item.

value.span: 动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的水平移动像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu horizontally relative to its parent menu item.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性调整动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的水平位置。Use the property to adjust the horizontal position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item. 此属性会影响动态菜单的位置, 具体取决于控件是垂直显示还是水平显示 ( 由属性指定)。This property affects the position of a dynamic menu differently depending on whether the control is displayed vertically or horizontally (as specified by the property). 下表介绍了这些差异。The following table describes the differences. |方向Orientation|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |水平Horizontal|默认情况下, 动态菜单直接显示在其父菜单项的下方。By default, a dynamic menu is displayed directly below its parent menu item. 设置此属性会将动态菜单位置与此基准位置水平移动。Setting this property shifts the dynamic menu position horizontally from this base position.| |垂直Vertical|默认情况下, 动态菜单项显示在其父菜单项旁, 不含任何间距。By default, a dynamic menu item is displayed next to its parent menu item without any spacing in between. 设置此属性将控制动态菜单和其父菜单项之间的水平间距。Setting this property controls the horizontal spacing between the dynamic menu and its parent menu item.| > [!NOTE] > 您可以将此属性设置为负值, 以使动态菜单按负方向移动。You can set this property to a negative value to shift a dynamic menu in a negative direction. 如果显示的是垂直菜单, 负值会导致动态菜单及其父菜单项重叠。If you are displaying a vertical menu, a negative value causes a dynamic menu and its parent menu item to overlap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定动态菜单和其父菜单项之间的5像素间隙。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a 5-pixel gap between a dynamic menu and its parent menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/CS/menudynamichorizontaloffsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/VB/menudynamichorizontaloffsetvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项上时, 使用该属性控制动态菜单项的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 是对象的一个属性 (例如`DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`例如)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`). 动态菜单项的样式属性按以下顺序应用:Style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或集合已定义, 此时将应用该集合或集合, 并重写其他菜单项样式属性。 If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义了集合, 则此时将应用该集合, 并覆盖其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在用户将鼠标指针置于动态菜单项上时, 使用属性将其背景色更改为浅天蓝色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the background color of a dynamic menu item to light sky blue when the user positions the mouse pointer over it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于插入文本, 以在移动设备上显示的菜单中设置动态菜单项的格式。This property can be used to insert text to format dynamic menu items in a menu displayed on mobile devices. 控件支持用于显示静态和动态菜单项的模板。The control supports templates for the display of static and dynamic menu items. 对于移动设备, 模板会被忽略, 因此, 此属性允许你添加字符或文本, 以便在不使用模板的情况下将格式应用于菜单项。For mobile devices, templates are ignored, so this property allows you to add characters or text to apply formatting to menu items without using a template. > [!NOTE] > 若要在使用此属性时实现一致的格式设置, 如果要使静态菜单项和动态菜单项之间的格式相同, 还应该设置属性。To achieve consistent formatting when you use this property, you should also set the property if you want the formatting to be identical between the static and dynamic menu items. 如果同时应用了模板格式设置和此属性, 则将忽略移动设备的模板格式设置。If both template formatting and this property are applied, the template formatting is ignored for mobile devices. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性将文本添加到每个菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to add text to each menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可调整动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的垂直位置。Use the property to adjust the vertical position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item. 此属性会影响动态菜单的位置, 具体取决于控件是垂直显示还是水平显示 ( 由属性指定)。This property affects the position of a dynamic menu differently depending on whether the control is displayed vertically or horizontally (as specified by the property). 下表介绍了这些差异。The following table describes the differences. |方向Orientation|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |水平Horizontal|默认情况下, 动态菜单直接显示在其父菜单项的下方, 无间距。By default, a dynamic menu is displayed directly below its parent menu item without any spacing in between. 设置此属性将控制动态菜单和其父菜单项之间的垂直间距。Setting this property controls the vertical spacing between the dynamic menu and its parent menu item.| |垂直Vertical|默认情况下, 动态菜单项在其父菜单项旁显示, 其上边缘对齐。By default, a dynamic menu item is displayed next to its parent menu item with the top edges aligned. 设置此属性会将动态菜单位置与此基准位置垂直移动。Setting this property shifts the dynamic menu position vertically from this base position.| > [!NOTE] > 您可以将此属性设置为负值, 以使动态菜单按负方向移动。You can set this property to a negative value to shift a dynamic menu in a negative direction. 如果显示的是水平菜单, 负值会导致动态菜单及其父菜单项重叠。If you are displaying a horizontal menu, a negative value causes a dynamic menu and its parent menu item to overlap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将动态菜单从其父菜单项的顶部向下移动10个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to shift a dynamic menu down by 10 pixels from the top of its parent menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/CS/menudynamichorizontaloffsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/VB/menudynamichorizontaloffsetvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用 CSS 样式控制其在浏览器中的外观。The control uses CSS styles to control its appearance in a browser. 默认情况下, 它会`style`呈现一个元素, 该元素包含它所使用的 css 类的 css 定义。By default, it renders a `style` element that contains the CSS definitions for the CSS classes that it uses. 在以下情况下, 你`false`通常会将此属性设置为:You typically set this property to `false` in the following situations: - 要提供自己的 CSS 定义, 以便自定义菜单的外观。You want to provide your own CSS definitions in order to customize the appearance of the menu. 然后, 你必须在页面中提供自己的 CSS 定义块, 或包含指向包含定义的外部 CSS 文件的链接。You must then provide your own block of CSS definitions in the page, or include a link to an external CSS file that contains the definitions. - 您需要保留默认外观, 但更喜欢将生成的 CSS 定义保留在单独的文件中。You want to keep the default appearance but prefer to keep the generated CSS definitions in a separate file. 然后, 必须提供文件并链接到该文件。You must then provide the file and link to it. 在这两种情况下, 您都可以通过将属性设置为 `true`, 运行页面, 然后在浏览器中查看页面, 来获取该控件生成的默认 CSS 块的副本。In either of these situations, you can get a copy of the default CSS block that the control generates by setting the property to `true`, running the page, and viewing the page in a browser. 然后, 可以在浏览器中查看页面源, 并将 CSS 块复制并粘贴到页面标记或单独的文件中。You can then view the page source in the browser and copy and paste the CSS block into the page markup or into a separate file. 如果将此属性设置为`false`, 则无法设置样式属性。If you set this property to `false`, you cannot set style properties. 例如, 不能在标记中`DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`添加特性, 也不能`DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`在代码中设置属性。For example, you cannot add a `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor` attribute in markup or set the `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor` property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合作为各个样式属性 ( 如) 的替代方法, 以控制各个级别菜单上的菜单项的样式。 Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as ) to control the style of menu items at the individual levels of the menu. 此集合中包含的样式基于菜单项的菜单级别应用于菜单项。The styles contained in this collection are applied to the menu items based on their menu level. 集合中的第一种样式对应于菜单第一级菜单项的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the first level of the menu. 集合中的第二个样式对应于菜单第二级菜单中菜单项的样式, 依此类推。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the second level of the menu, and so on. 此集合通常用于生成目录样式的导航菜单, 其中某个级别的菜单项应具有相同的外观, 无论它们是否具有子菜单。This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用集合为某个级别定义了样式, 则会覆盖该级别菜单项的任何菜单项样式设置。If a style is defined for a certain level using the collection, this overrides any menu item style settings for the menu items at that level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合基于控件在控件中的菜单项级别应用样式设置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to apply style settings to the menu items in a control based on their level. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuLevelMenuItemStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelMenuItemStyles/CS/menulevelmenuitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuLevelMenuItemStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelMenuItemStyles/VB/menulevelmenuitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置动态菜单的菜单呈现级别数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of menu levels to render for a dynamic menu.

value.span: 动态菜单的菜单呈现级别数。

span.span: The number of menu levels to render for a dynamic menu.

value.span: 默认值为 3。

span.span: The default is 3.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过将属性设置为大于1的值, 在静态菜单中显示多个菜单级别。You can display multiple menu levels in the static menu by setting the property to a value greater than 1. 还可以通过将此属性设置为大于0的值来显示动态菜单中的其他级别。You can also display additional levels in dynamic menus by setting this property to a value greater than 0. 例如, 如果在静态菜单中显示两个菜单级别 (通过将属性设置为 2), 然后将此属性设置为 3, 则在动态菜单中显示三个附加的菜单级别。For example, if you display two menu levels in the static menu (by setting the property to 2) and then set this property to 3, three additional menu levels are displayed in dynamic menus. 所有剩余的更高菜单级别 (如果有) 将被丢弃。All remaining higher menu levels (if any) are discarded. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为 0, 则会在不使用任何动态菜单的情况下, 在属性指定的级别上显示一个平面菜单。Setting this property to 0 displays a flat menu up to the level specified by the property, without any dynamic menus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将动态菜单中显示的菜单级别数限制为1。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to limit the number of menu levels to display in a dynamic menu to 1. 只显示根菜单级别。Only the root menu level is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels/CS/menumaximumdynamicdisplaylevelscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels/VB/menumaximumdynamicdisplaylevelsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuItemClick As MenuEventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 控件中的菜单项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a menu item in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 控件中单击菜单项时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when a menu item is clicked in a control. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序在此事件发生时执行自定义例程 (如与页上的另一个控件同步)。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing with another control on the page, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您访问引发事件的菜单项的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to access the properties of the menu item that raised the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件创建事件处理程序, 该事件显示用户选定的菜单项的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the event that displays the text of the menu item selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuMenuItemClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMenuItemClick/CS/menumenuitemclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuMenuItemClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMenuItemClick/VB/menumenuitemclickvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当菜单项绑定到控件中的数据时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when a menu item is bound to data in a control. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程 (如添加自定义内容或修改菜单项)。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content or modifying a menu item before it is rendered, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您访问引发事件的菜单项的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to access the properties of the menu item that raised the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件创建事件处理程序, 以便在`Home`菜单项显示在控件中之前修改该菜单项的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the event that modifies the text of the `Home` menu item before it is displayed in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据绑定到控件时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when data is bound to the control. 此方法通知控件执行与其关联的任何数据绑定逻辑。This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it. 方法允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 在扩展类时, 控件开发人员通常会使用此方法。This method is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知时, Web 服务器控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件生命周期的此阶段中, 尚未填充控件的视图状态。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外, 如果调用此方法, 则不能访问另一个服务器控件, 而不管它是此控件的子控件还是父控件。Additionally, you cannot access another server control when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不保证其他服务器控件已创建并且可供访问。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由控件调用以引发事件。 The method is called by the control to raise the event. 在扩展类时, 控件开发人员通常会使用此方法。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定控件的呈现方向。 Use the property to specify the direction in which to render the control. 下表列出了可用的方向。The following table lists the available directions. |方向Orientation|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Orientation.Horizontal`|控件在水平方向上呈现。The control is rendered horizontally.| |`Orientation.Vertical`|控件在垂直方向上呈现。The control is rendered vertically.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示水平菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a horizontal menu. summary.span: 获取或设置用于分隔 控件的菜单项路径的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character used to delimit the path of a menu item in a control.

value.span: 用于分隔菜单项路径的字符。

span.span: The character used to delimit the path of a menu item.

value.span: 默认值为斜杠 (/)。

span.span: The default value is a slash mark (/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件中的每个菜单项 (由对象表示) 都具有一个属性, 该属性指定菜单项的位置。 Each menu item (represented by a object) in the control has a property that specifies the position of the menu item. 值路径是一串分隔值, 构成从根菜单项到当前菜单项的路径。The value path is a string of delimited values that form the path from a root menu item to the current menu item. 使用属性可以指定用于分隔菜单路径中的值的分隔字符。Use the property to specify the delimiting character used to separate the values in the menu path. 此值通常在分析各个值的列表时使用。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values. 根据控件中显示的文本, 分隔符字符可能需要更改以防止任何冲突。Depending on the text displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如, 如果将分隔符字符设置为逗号, 则显示的文本不应包含任何逗号;否则, 属性无法准确分析。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the property cannot be parsed accurately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将菜单项的值路径的分隔符字符更改为逗号。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the delimiter character for a menu item's value path to a comma. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuPathSeparator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuPathSeparator/CS/menupathseparatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuPathSeparator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuPathSeparator/VB/menupathseparatorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 控件是呈现 HTML 元素和内联样式，还是呈现 元素和级联样式表 (CSS) 样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control renders HTML elements and inline styles, or elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.

value.span: 一个值，该值指定 控件是呈现 HTML 元素和内联样式，还是呈现 元素和级联样式表 (CSS) 样式。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the control renders HTML elements and inline styles, or elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值决定菜单控件如何呈现控件的标记。The value of the property determines how the menu control renders markup for the control. 在 ASP.NET 3.5 及更低版本中 , 控件使用`table` HTML 元素和内联样式在浏览器中指定菜单的外观。In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, the control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles to specify the appearance of the menu in a browser. 在 ASP.NET 4 和更高版本中, 默认情况下, `listitem`该控件使用 HTML 元素和级联样式表 (CSS) 样式。In ASP.NET 4 and later versions, by default the control uses HTML `listitem` elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles. 如果未设置此属性, 则控件将呈现适合于属性所指示的 ASP.NET 版本的标记。If you do not set this property, the control renders markup that is appropriate to the ASP.NET version that is indicated by the property. 控件使用以下规则:The control uses the following rules: - 如果属性的值为`3.5`, 则控件使用 HTML `table`元素和内联样式。If the value of the property is `3.5`, the control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles. - 如果属性的值为`4.0`或更大, 则控件使用 HTML `listitem`元素和 CSS 样式。If the value of the property is `4.0` or greater, the control uses HTML `listitem` elements and CSS styles. 提供此属性是为了向后兼容。This property is provided for backward compatibility. 如果属性指示想要控件生成与 ASP.NET 4 或更高版本兼容的 HTML, 但要使控件成为使用早期行为的异常, 则可以将此属性设置为。 If the property indicates that you want controls to generate HTML that is compatible with ASP.NET 4 or later, but you want the control to be an exception that uses earlier behavior, you can set this property to . 例如, 如果您的网页显示从右到左的文本, 您可能希望将此属性设置为, 因为某些浏览器不会正确地显示从右到左文本的模式标记。For example, if you have a Web page that displays text from right to left you might want to set this property to because some browsers do not display the mode markup properly for right-to-left text.

summary.span: 获取或设置动态菜单中显示的图像的 URL，以指示用户可以向下滚动查看更多菜单项。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image displayed in a dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.

value.span: 动态菜单中显示的图像的 URL，指示用户可以向下滚动查看更多菜单项。

span.span: The URL to an image displayed in a dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在 .NET 4.0 呈现模式中不受支持。This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode. 如果此属性是必需的, 则可以通过在页面的代码中添加以下内容, 将菜单设置为 .NET 3.5 呈现模式:If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code: ``` menuInstance.RenderingCompatibility = new Version(3, 5); ``` 使用属性指定要在每个动态菜单底部显示的自定义图像, 以指示用户可以向下滚动查看更多菜单项。Use the property to specify a custom image to display at the bottom of each dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置此属性, 则使用内部默认图像。If this property is not set, the internal, default image is used. 可以通过设置属性来指定图像的替换文字。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示自定义图像, 该图像指示用户可以在动态菜单中向下滚动查看更多菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a custom image indicating that the user can scroll down in a dynamic menu for additional menu items. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/CS/menuscrolldownimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/VB/menuscrolldownimagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性中指定的图像的替换文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text for the image specified in the property.

value.span: 属性中指定的图像的替换文字。

span.span: The alternate text for the image specified in the property.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在 .NET 4.0 呈现模式中不受支持。This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode. 如果此属性是必需的, 则可以通过在页面的代码中添加以下内容, 将菜单设置为 .NET 3.5 呈现模式:If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code: ``` menuInstance.RenderingCompatibility = new Version(3, 5); ``` 当动态菜单项在菜单底部包含其他项时, 将显示一个图像, 指示用户可以向下滚动以查看其他菜单项。When a dynamic menu item contains additional items at the bottom of the menu, an image is displayed to indicate that the user can scroll down to view additional menu items. 使用属性指定此图像的替换文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for this image. 指定的文本为辅助技术设备提供了可用于使控件更易于访问的图像说明。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定图像的替换文字, 该图像用于指示用户可以在动态菜单中向下滚动查看更多菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for the image used to indicate that the user can scroll down in a dynamic menu for additional menu items. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/CS/menuscrolldownimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/VB/menuscrolldownimagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置屏幕读取器所读取的隐藏图像的替换文字，以提供跳过链接列表的功能。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.

value.span: 屏幕读取器所读取的隐藏图像的替换文字，可提供跳过链接列表的功能。

span.span: The alternate text of a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定屏幕阅读器读取的隐藏图像的替换文字, 以提供跳过链接列表的功能。Use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links. 指定的文本提供了辅助技术设备, 其中包含可用于使控件更易于访问的隐藏跳过链接图像。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden skip link image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 控件提供属性作为一种方法, 让屏幕阅读器跳过整个控件。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果设置了属性, 则会呈现一个带有替换文本的不可见图像, 从而向用户提供跳转到控件末尾的选项。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control. 屏幕阅读器读取备用文本, 而图像只占用一个像素空间。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, and the image occupies only one pixel space. 若要对页面的呈现进行像素精确的控制, 请将属性设置为空字符串 (""), 并提供您自己的用于跳过菜单的机制。For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the menu. 默认情况下, 属性设置为空字符串。The property is set to the empty string by default. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定屏幕阅读器读取的隐藏图像的替换文字, 以提供跳过链接列表的功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuSkipLinkText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSkipLinkText/CS/menuskiplinktextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuSkipLinkText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSkipLinkText/VB/menuskiplinktextvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项上时, 使用该属性控制静态菜单项的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 是对象的一个属性 (例如`StaticHoverStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `StaticHoverStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `StaticHoverStyle.ForeColor`例如)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `StaticHoverStyle.ForeColor`). 静态菜单项的样式属性按以下顺序应用:Style properties for a static menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或集合已定义, 此时将应用该集合或集合, 并重写其他菜单项样式属性。 If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义了集合, 则此时将应用该集合, 并覆盖其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了当用户将鼠标指针置于静态菜单项上时, 如何使用该属性将其背景色更改为浅天蓝色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the background color of a static menu item to light sky blue when the user positions the mouse pointer over it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于插入文本, 以便设置菜单中静态菜单项的格式。This property can be used to insert text to format static menu items in a menu. 这对于移动设备特别有用。This is particularly useful for mobile devices. 控件支持用于显示静态和动态菜单项的模板, 但在移动设备上忽略模板。The control supports templates for the display of static and dynamic menu items, but templates are ignored on mobile devices. 此属性允许你添加字符或文本, 并为移动设备和桌面设备的菜单项应用格式设置, 而无需使用模板。This property allows you to add characters or text and to apply formatting to menu items for both mobile and desktop devices without using a template. > [!NOTE] > 若要在使用此属性时实现一致的格式设置, 如果要使静态菜单项和动态菜单项之间的格式相同, 还应该设置属性。To achieve consistent formatting when you use this property, you should also set the property if you want the formatting to be identical between the static and dynamic menu items. 如果同时应用了模板格式设置和此属性, 则将忽略移动设备的模板格式设置。If both template formatting and this property are applied, the template formatting is ignored for mobile devices. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性将文本添加到每个菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to add text to each menu item.   • item_0

    •      ``` 但是, 在 .NET Framework 4.0 及更高版本中, 所选菜单项始终`selected`设置为 CSS 类, 而不是由`StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`指定的类。However, in .NET Framework 4.0 and later, the selected menu item is set to the `selected` CSS class always instead of the class specified by `StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`. 因此, 上述 ASP.NET 代码将改为:Therefore, the above ASP.NET code is rendered instead as: ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击菜单项时要在其中显示其链接到菜单项的 Web 内容的窗口或框架。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. 值必须以 A 到 Z 范围内的字母（不区分大小写）打头，但某些以下划线打头的特殊值除外，如下表所示：Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. |目标值Target value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如, Internet Explorer 版本5.0 及更高版本支持`_search`目标值For example, Internet Explorer versions 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value 此属性适用于控件中的所有菜单项。This property applies to all menu items in a control. 可以通过直接设置每个 对象的属性来有选择地重写此属性。You can selectively override this property by setting the property of each object directly. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为目标特性。The property renders as a target attribute. 不允许在 XHTML 1.1 strict 文档类型定义中使用定位点元素的目标属性。The target attribute on anchor elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 strict document type definition. 如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 或可访问性标准, 请不要设置属性。If rendered output must conform to XHTML or accessibility standards, do not set the property. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual studio 中的 XHTML 标准和](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) [visual studio 和 ASP.NET 中的 ASP.NET 和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定在用户单击菜单项时, 链接到每个菜单项的内容应显示在新窗口中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the content linked to each menu item should be displayed in a new window when the user clicks that menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuTarget/CS/menutargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuTarget/VB/menutargetvb.aspx#1)]
